name: UIImageViewAligned
summary: A UIImageView subclass which allows you to align the image left/right/top/bottom, even when contentMode is AspectFit.
description:
「   converted automatically by plugin cocoapods-imy-bin @厦门美柚 - slj    」
 It is a subclass of UIImageView that allows you to customize the alignment of the displayed image inside the view's frame. This works even if the contentMode is set to AspectFit, AspectFill or ScaleToFill.
